WelcomePage.appDescription: This application is a lightweight platform for using and building APIs. It supports method selection, URL inputs, and headers. It was created by a team of students during the React course at RS School. Try it out!
WelcomePage.rsDescription: RS School is a free, community-driven online education program conducted by The Rolling Scopes Community since 2013. Over 500 developers from various countries and companies actively participate as mentors in the education process.

common.questionText: Do you already have an account?

Validation.validationName2Characters: Name must be at least 2 characters.
Validation.validationEmailInvalidOrDomain: Invalid email format or missing domain.
Validation.validationPasswordValidSetOfCharacters: Password must only contain Latin symbols, digits, special characters adnd unicode symbols.
Validation.validationPasswordUpperCaseLetter: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
Validation.validationPasswordLowerCaseLetter: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
Validation.validationPasswordDigit: Password must contain at least one digit.
Validation.validationPasswordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.
